title: Ukraine war: The volunteer drivers risking their lives to save others
description: Drivers describe evacuating people from Russian-held areas under threat of mines and military attack.

title: Aurangzeb: Why is a Mughal emperor who died 300 years ago being debated on social media?
description: Aurangzeb ruled India 300 years ago - but a modern day dispute has seen hatred for him boil up again.

title: Israeli police accused of violence towards shot Palestinian's family
description: Relatives say police used unjustifiable force on them inside the hospital treating the wounded man.

title: Rwanda deal: Migrants in Calais say they'll still try to cross to UK
description: Many in the camp say they are still determined to reach the UK, citing family ties and jobs.

title: Formula milk: Online groups hunt for baby milk during US shortage
description: A shortage of infant formula across America has led parents to share supply locations online.

title: Monkeypox: Time to worry or one to ignore?
description: We are facing an unusual and unprecedented monkeypox outbreak but how worrying is it?

title: Nigeria's facial scars: The last generation
description: The marks were a way of identifying the lineage of people, but the practice has been outlawed.

title: Week in pictures: 14 - 20 May 2022
description: A selection of powerful images from all over the globe, taken in the past seven days.

title: Non-binary in Iraq: ‘People get killed’
description: For Iraq's non-binary community, life is difficult and dangerous.

title: The desperate journey Cubans make by water to the US

title: From foster care to fostering our own children
description: Two former foster children say their experience shaped their decision to help others.

description: The woman stripped on the Cannes red carpet to show the words "stop raping us" and the Ukrainian flag.

description: Russia wants to sell energy from a seized plant and a man paints anti-war slogans on his shop.

title: Ukraine war: What might tip the balance?

title: Top Gun: Cruise encounter sees helicopter couple at premiere
description: Tom Cruise used Alison Webb's Baginton garden to land his helicopter then returned the favour.

description: Six takeaways from the High Court libel trial, which has sparked huge media interest in recent weeks.

description: Russia occupies Europe's biggest nuclear plant and now wants to sell power from it back to Ukraine.

description: BBC Sport recaps a week of pitch invasions and violence in football as managers express concerns for safety.

title: Street harassment law being blocked, adviser Nimco Ali says
description: Nimco Ali says her plans for on-the-spot fines for wolf-whistling and other acts received "pushback".

title: Russia halts gas supplies to Finland
description: Finland has refused to pay for gas in roubles but also angered Moscow by applying to join Nato.

title: Vangelis: Chariots of Fire and Blade Runner composer dies at 79
description: The Greek star's Oscar-winning film scores and electronic works created "a new musical landscape".

title: Formula 1: Red Bull accuse Aston Martin of copying car design
description: Red Bull accuse Aston Martin of copying their car and question whether any of their intellectual property has been stolen.

title: John Shuttleworth cave concert abandoned due to cliff rescue
description: A walker got lost, slipped and was left clinging to a tree 100ft (30m) above the cave entrance.

title: Covid infections down again to 1 in 50 says ONS
description: Infections have been falling since the end of March, after the Omicron variant pushed up cases.

title: How easy is it to drive across Wales in an electric car?
description: Charging points are lacking in much of the UK - so how easy is it to drive across Wales in an electric car?

description: Health secretary says "most cases" have been mild and further doses of a vaccine have been ordered.

description: Locations including Milton Keynes, Dunfermline and Wrexham will be made cities in honour of the Queen.

title: Australia election: Why is Australia's parliament so white?
